  <div id="cs-content" class="cs-content"><div id="x-section-1" class="x-section cs-ta-center" style="margin: 0px;padding: 65px 0px 45px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);" ><div id="" class="x-container max width" style="margin: 0px auto;padding: 0px;" ><div  class="x-column x-sm x-1-1" style="padding: 0px;" ><img  class="x-img x-img-none" style="border:none;margin-bottom:0;width:100%;max-width:500px;" src="https://masto.host/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/mastohost_1000.png" alt="Masto.host"><div id="" class="x-text" style="font-size:2.2rem;line-height:2.2rem;padding: 3rem 0 1rem;" ><p>fully managed Mastodon hosting</p>
</div></div></div></div><div class="x-section e5-6 m5-0"><div class="x-container max width e5-7 m5-1"><div class="x-column x-sm x-1-3 e5-8 m5-2"><h2  class="h-custom-headline resp-h mtn h3" style="color: hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0);color: #fff;"><span>how it works</span></h2><div id="" class="x-text" style="color: #fff;" ><p class="resp-p">Masto.host makes running a Mastodon server really easy.</p>
</div><a class="x-anchor x-anchor-button e5-11 m5-3 m5-4 m5-5 m5-6" tabindex="0" href="https://masto.host/how/"><div class="x-anchor-content"><div class="x-anchor-text"><span class="x-anchor-text-primary">view details</span></div></div></a></div><div class="x-column x-sm x-1-3 e5-12 m5-2"><h2  class="h-custom-headline resp-h mtn h3" style="color: #fff;"><span>pricing</span></h2><div id="" class="x-text" style="color: #fff;" ><p class="resp-p">For only $6/month, you can have your own Mastodon server.</p>
</div><a class="x-anchor x-anchor-button e5-15 m5-3 m5-4 m5-5 m5-6" tabindex="0" href="https://masto.host/pricing/"><div class="x-anchor-content"><div class="x-anchor-text"><span class="x-anchor-text-primary">view plans</span></div></div></a></div><div class="x-column x-sm x-1-3 e5-16 m5-2"><h2  class="h-custom-headline resp-h mtn h3" style="color: #fff;"><span>need help</span></h2><div id="" class="x-text" style="color: #fff;" ><p class="resp-p">Email any problem or question related to Mastodon or Masto.host to:</p>
</div><a class="x-anchor x-anchor-button e5-19 m5-3 m5-4 m5-5 m5-6" tabindex="0" href="mailto:info@masto.host?subject=Masto.host%20contact"><div class="x-anchor-content"><div class="x-anchor-text"><span class="x-anchor-text-primary">info@masto.host</span></div></div></a></div></div></div><div id="x-section-2" class="x-section cs-ta-center" style="margin: 0px;padding: 65px 0px; background-color: #ffffff;" ><div id="" class="x-container max width" style="margin: 0px auto;padding: 0px;" ><div  class="x-column x-sm x-1-1" style="padding: 0px;" ><div class="x-text x-text-headline e5-23 m5-b m5-c"><div class="x-text-content"><div class="x-text-content-text"><h1 class="x-text-content-text-primary">What is Mastodon?</h1></div></div></div></div></div><div id="" class="x-container max width" style="margin: 0px auto 30px;padding: 0px;" ><div  class="x-column x-sm x-1-3" style="padding: 0px;" ><img  class="x-img man homeCircles x-img-circle"  src="https://masto.host/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/new-mastodon-logo-home.png" alt="mastodon logo"><h3  class="h-custom-headline mtm h4" ><span>microblogging network</span></h3><div id="" class="x-text hstxt" style="" ><p class="man">It's a microblogging social network that brings the control back to your hands.</p>
</div><hr  class="x-gap cs-hide-xl cs-hide-lg cs-hide-md" style="margin: 40px 0 0 0;"></div><div  class="x-column x-sm x-1-3" style="padding: 0px;" ><img  class="x-img man homeCircles x-img-circle"  src="https://masto.host/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/elephants-circle-home.png" alt="multiple mastodon"><h3  class="h-custom-headline mtm h4" ><span>decentralized</span></h3><div id="" class="x-text hstxt" style="" ><p class="man">Each Mastodon instance is independent, and anyone is free to run their own.</p>
</div><hr  class="x-gap cs-hide-xl cs-hide-lg cs-hide-md" style="margin: 40px 0 0 0;"></div><div  class="x-column x-sm x-1-3" style="padding: 0px;" ><img  class="x-img man homeCircles x-img-circle"  src="https://masto.host/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/flying-circle-home.png" alt="flying mastodon"><h3  class="h-custom-headline mtm h4" ><span>open source</span></h3><div id="" class="x-text hstxt" style="" ><p class="man">Mastodon is free, and its code is open-source.</p>
</div></div></div><div id="" class="x-container max width" style="margin: 0px auto;padding: 0px;" ><div  class="x-column x-sm x-1-1" style="padding: 0px;" ><a class="x-anchor x-anchor-button e5-41 m5-4 m5-6 m5-7 m5-8 m5-9" tabindex="0" href="https://joinmastodon.org/" target="_blank"><div class="x-anchor-content"><div class="x-anchor-text"><span class="x-anchor-text-primary">Visit Mastodon Website</span></div></div></a></div></div><div id="" class="x-container max width" style="margin: 0px auto;padding: 0px;" ><div  class="x-column x-sm x-1-1" style="padding: 0px;" ><div class="x-text x-text-headline e5-44 m5-b m5-d"><div class="x-text-content"><div class="x-text-content-text"><h1 class="x-text-content-text-primary">And what is Masto.host?</h1></div></div></div></div></div><div id="" class="x-container max width" style="margin: 0px auto 30px;padding: 0px;" ><div  class="x-column x-sm x-1-3" style="padding: 0px;" ><img  class="x-img man homeCircles x-img-circle"  src="https://masto.host/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/hosting-1.png" alt="Placeholder"><h3  class="h-custom-headline mtm h4" ><span>hosting</span></h3><div id="" class="x-text hstxt" style="" ><p class="man">Masto.host provides you a hosting platform optimised to run Mastodon.</p>
</div><hr  class="x-gap cs-hide-xl cs-hide-lg cs-hide-md" style="margin: 40px 0 0 0;"></div><div  class="x-column x-sm x-1-3" style="padding: 0px;" ><img  class="x-img man homeCircles x-img-circle"  src="https://masto.host/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/installation.png" alt="Placeholder"><h3  class="h-custom-headline mtm h4" ><span>installation</span></h3><div id="" class="x-text hstxt" style="" ><p class="man">Mastodon comes pre-installed on all Masto.host hosting plans.</p>

readabilityObject.title: Masto.host
readabilityObject.content:
fully managed Mastodon hosting

how it works

Masto.host makes running a Mastodon server really easy.

pricing

For only $6/month, you can have your own Mastodon server.

need help

Email any problem or question related to Mastodon or Masto.host to:

What is Mastodon?

microblogging network

It's a microblogging social network that brings the control back to your hands.

decentralized

Each Mastodon instance is independent, and anyone is free to run their own.

open source

Mastodon is free, and its code is open-source.

And what is Masto.host?

hosting

Masto.host provides you a hosting platform optimised to run Mastodon.

installation

Mastodon comes pre-installed on all Masto.host hosting plans.

maintenance

Servers are kept updated and run the latest stable release of Mastodon.

others opinion

what users say about Masto.Host

"And thanks to the wonderful @mastohost, I am up and running again with my own instance and Mastodon has never felt so slick :)"

"Supremely happy with Masto.host. My questions are answered super fast, uptime is amazing - really great service and hosting experience!"

"Having Hugo from Masto.Host manage the hosting side for us is a large part of the reason why Fosstodon has been so successful."

"If you want your own Masto instance, I can't recommend @hugo's masto.host service enough."

"If you are searching an easy way to manage your own instance, you are at the right place! Masto.host offers great services and @hugo is really responsive for helping."

"Juuuust in case you haven't heard, @hugo is kind of a bad ass. I submit trouble report (without a ticket, because i'm a filthy casual) and he triaged/addressed in 4 minutes flat. now *that* is some response time I can get behind, because its better than any SLA I've ever actually experienced.

blog

Information about Mastodon
technical details and
Masto.host announcements
